code: class  Solution  {   public :   long  long  maxRunTime ( int  n ,  vector < int >&  batteries )  {   long  sum  =  accumulate ( batteries . begin (),  batteries . end (),  0L );   ranges :: sort ( batteries );       while  ( batteries . back ()  >  sum  /  n )  {   sum  -=  batteries . back (),  batteries . pop_back ();   -- n ;   }       return  sum  /  n ;   }  };
